root.name: Power Fighters
root.description: OverviewPower Fighters is a beat 'em up developed by Daft Co. and published by both D3 Publisher (Japanese release) and 505 Games (European Release) for the PlayStation 2 platform.In Japan the game is a part of the Simple 2000 series and is called Simple 2000 Series Vol. 60: The Tokusatsu Henshin Hero.
